subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: With college football teams ranked Nos. 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 16 and 17 in The Associated Press’s poll falling, suddenly teams with one loss — or maybe even two — have cause for hope.
snippet: With college football teams ranked Nos. 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 16 and 17 in The Associated Press’s poll falling, suddenly teams with one loss — or maybe even two — have cause for hope.
